title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB:
When reproducing the steps in 1GEWMOZ:
1. Open the ITPUI:WIN2000Scripted resource editor example.
2. Create a new basic project.
3. Create a new file named test.xml.
4. Despite the file being an XML, the editor used is the scripted resource editor example, which does not consider the XML file content.
5. In the Navigator, select test.xml.
6. Right-click and choose 'Open With...' and select 'Default Text Editor'.
7. Observe that nothing happens and the scripted resource editor example is still active.

The issue is that when selecting 'Open With...', it should open a new editor on the file because the editor type is different.
EB:
